author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41858

#### PR validation:

None beyond https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41858

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41858 in order to eventually enhance the DQM module mentioned in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/41843 to check the referenced-to product availability.
title: [13_0_X] Add isAvailable() function to RefToBaseProd
